i1.name: Glorious Evolution
description:
{{sbc|Innate:}} '''Viktor''' starts each game with an exclusive {{ii|Prototype Hex Core}}, which permanently occupies one of his item slots. For some additional gold, '''Viktor''' can upgrade his ''Hex Core'' to increase its bonuses and grant him one ''Evolution'' point, which he can use to augment one of his basic [[Champion ability|abilities]]. Once he augments all of his basic abilities, '''Viktor''' automatically augments his ultimate ability, {{ai|Chaos Storm|Viktor}}.
* {{ii|Prototype Hex Core}}: {{Item data Prototype Hex Core|pst2|pass}}
* {{ii|Hex Core mk-1}}: {{Item data Hex Core mk-1|pst2|pass}} And one Evolution Point.
* {{ii|Hex Core mk-2}}: {{Item data Hex Core mk-2|pst2|pass}} And one Evolution Point.
* {{ii|Perfect Hex Core}}: {{Item data Perfect Hex Core|pst2|pass}} And one Evolution Point.

q1.name: Siphon Power
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Viktor''' {{tip|shields}} himself for {{pp|30 to 115}} {{as|(+ 15% AP)}} for {{fd|2.5}} seconds, deals {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} to the target enemy, and gains {{ai|Discharge|Viktor}} for {{fd|3.5}} seconds.
{{sbc|{{ai|Discharge|Viktor}}:}} '''Viktor's''' next [[basic attack]] won't use a {{tip|projectile}} and is modified to deal {{as|magic damage}}.

{{sbc|{{ai|Augment- Turbocharge|Viktor|Augment: Turbocharge}}:}} '''Viktor''' instantly gains {{sti|ms|{{as|30% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for {{fd|2.5}} seconds after using ''Siphon Power'', while also increasing the shield's value by 60%, up to {{pp|30*1.6 to 115*1.6}} {{as|(+ 24% AP)}}.
q1.notes:
* The enhanced attack activates on-ability-hit procs.
* The enhanced attack will apply other [[on-hit effect]]s and can critically strike as normal.
** The enhanced attack's damage has two components. {{tip|Critical strike}} and {{sti|life steal}} only interact with the basic attack damage component.
** The enhanced attack itself does '''not''' apply spell effects such as {{sti|Spell vamp}} or {{ii|Rylai's Crystal Scepter}}.
** The bonus damage will not trigger on structures.
** All damage dealt by {{nie|Spellblade}} on the enhanced attack is converted into magic damage.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block the damage, but will not cancel the shield nor the auto attack and movement speed buffs.

effects.str:
• Discharge Damage: (+ 100% AD) (+ 55% AP)
  • Total Damage: (+ 100% AD) (+ 95% AP)

w1.name: Gravity Field
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Viktor''' deploys a gravitational imprisonment device at the target location which arms after a brief delay. For 4 seconds, the trap {{tip|slow|slows}} all enemies that pass through its field, persisting for {{fd|0.25}} seconds after leaving.
Whilst under the trap's effects, enemies generate a stack every {{fd|0.5}} seconds. At 3 stacks, enemies are {{tip|knockdown|knocked down}} and {{tip|stun|stunned}} for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
{{sbc|{{ai|Augment- Magnetize|Viktor|Augment: Magnetize}}:}} '''Viktor's''' abilities, excluding {{ai|Chaos Storm|Viktor}}, {{tip|slow}} enemies hit by 20% for 1 second.
w1.notes:
* An enemy can only be stunned by the field once per cast, after which they will '''not''' be slowed or accumulate stacks again.
* ''Gravity Field'' will remain active if '''Viktor''' dies.
* ''Gravity Field's'' animation can be seen by both teams through [[Sight|fog of war]].

e1.name: Death Ray
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Viktor''' uses his synthetic arm to fire an energy beam 500 units down the target path, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to every enemy it hits. The arm can fire in any direction from any point within [[range]], and does not interrupt '''Viktor's''' previous orders.
{{sbc|{{ai|Augment- Aftershock|Viktor|Augment: Aftershock}}:}} An explosion follows ''Death Ray's'' wake after 1 second, dealing additional {{as|magic damage}}.
e1.notes:
* ''Death Ray'' has no cast time and Viktor may freely act while the ray is travelling.
** The effected area is set upon casting, no matter how far away Viktor moves. Unlike a leash, ''Death Ray'' will not break off its own effect.
* The laser grants a moderate area of [[sight]] around where the beam strikes the ground.
* If ''Death Ray'' is blocked by {{ai|Wind Wall|Yasuo}} or {{ai|Unbreakable|Braum}}, the explosions will travel only up to the wall and will not continue past it.
** However, the capability to be blocked only applies to the laser as it hits the ground. Viktor can cast the ability ''over'' the wall and it will not be destroyed or intercepted.
* If Viktor dies while he is firing the beam it will become interrupted and deal damage up to the location where it was in the moment Viktor died.

r1.name: Chaos Storm
description: {{sbc|First Cast:}} '''Viktor''' conjures an arcane singularity at the target location, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to every enemy it hits and {{tip|Disrupt|interrupting channeled abilities}}. The singularity remains active for {{fd|6.5}} seconds afterwards, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all nearby enemies every second.

{{sbc|Second Cast:}} '''Viktor''' directs the singularity to the target location. Once the singularity damages an enemy [[champion]], it automatically follows them until the target dies or escapes it. The singularity moves faster depending on its proximity to '''Viktor'''.
{{sbc|{{ai|Augment- Perfect Storm|Viktor|Augment: Perfect Storm}}:}} ''Chaos Storm'' moves 25% faster.
r1.notes:
* If '''Viktor''' dies, ''Chaos Storm'' will remain active and follow the targeted enemy champion.
* ''Chaos Storm'' reaches its maximum speed at 300 units and minimum speed at 900 units away from '''Viktor'''.
* Including the initial damage, ''Chaos Storm'' deals 7 instance of damage. 
** {{ii|Rylai's Crystal Scepter}} will apply a 20% slow on each instance of damage dealt.
* ''Chaos Storm'' can be controlled by Alt + Right-Click or by pressing the R button (''default hotkeys''). It can be commanded to move toward locations or enemy champions (''it will continue to follow the chosen enemy champion unless commanded otherwise'').
* If '''Viktor''' is affected by hard [[crowd control]] he cannot issue new commands to the singularity.
* If the champion the storm is currently following enters [[stealth]], the singularity will continue to follow them, effectively giving away their position. 
* The singularity grants [[sight]] around its position for the full duration..
* ''Chaos Storm'' can go through terrain.
